2+2=4
5-3=2
7/2=3
2*3=6
9%5=4
neg 7=-7
neg 7.5=-7.5
1 == 1 = true
1>2 = false
2>1 = true
2>2 = false
1<2 = true
2<1 = false
2<2 = false
1>=2 = false
2>=1 = true
2>=2 = true
1<=2 = true
2<=1 = false
2<=2 = true
1 != 1 = false
1 != 0 = true
not 1 = false
not 0 = true
1 and 0 = false
1 or 0 = true
MIN(3, 2) = 2
MAX(3, 2) = 3
